title: ELEC5501
notes:
` ul u = (u_1, u_2, u_3)`,
` ul v = (v_1, v_2, v_3)`,
`(ul u * ul v) = u_1 xx v_1 + u_2 xx v_2 + u_3 xx v_3` for discrete and
`(ul u * ul v) = int_T u(t)v^**(t) dt` for continuous

`||ul V|| = sqrt(V.V) = sqrt(int_T|V(t)|^2dt`
Square root of the auto inner product

Discrete: `d(u,v) = ||u-v|| = sqrt(sum_(i=1)^n(u_i-v_i)^2)` and
Continuous: `d(u,v) = ||u(t) - v(t)|| = sqrt(int_T(|u(t) - v(t)|^2dt))`
`{ul phi_1, ul phi_2, ul phi_3, ul phi_4}` where `(ul phi_a * ul phi_b)` if `a != b`
Maximum number of customers allowed in queue and being served
Arrival Poisson distributed and Service time exponentially distributed
TODO with known mean and variance
`U = rho = lambda / mu < 1`, Percentage of time that all of the servers are busy
Probability that there are no customers in the system
Probability that there are `n` customers in the system
Average Customer Wait Time in queue
`W_q = W - 1 / mu = lambda / (mu(mu - lambda)) = L_q / lambda = rho / (mu(1 - rho))`
Average Number of customers in Queue
Average Number of customers in system
`L = lambdaW = L_q + rho = rho / (1 - rho) = lambda / (mu - lambda)`
